document.full_text: president bashar al-assad ended syria's state of emergency, in effect for nearly 50 years, on thursday in an attempt to defuse mass protests against his authoritarian rule that have gripped syria for over a month.
document.title: syria's assad ends state of emergency
lines_and_colors: president bashar al-assad ended syria's state of emergency, in effect for nearly 50 years, on thursday in an attempt to defuse mass protests against his authoritarian rule that have gripped syria for over a month.
